ai-kv13.1:4.2_0: “Is the remainder of what is allowable?”
ai-kv13.1:5.2_0: The schismatic stays there for an eon.
ai-kv13.1:5.3_0: Taking a stand against the teaching,

ai-kv13.1:6.3_0: Therefore, for an eon would remain for the lifespan.
ai-kv13.1:6.4_0: The story at the eon is finished.
